Comments** When visitors leave comments on our site, we collect data
shown in the comments form, their IP address, and browser user agent string to
help with spam detection.

Cookies** We use cookies to enhance your experience:

  * If you leave a comment, you may opt-in to save your name, email, and website in cookies for convenience.

Such content from other
websites behaves as if the visitor has visited these other websites, which may
collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking,
and monitor your interaction with embedded content.

For registered users, we store personal information provided in
their user profile, which they can see, edit, or delete (username cannot be
changed).
sharing:
An anonymized string (hash) created from your email
address may be provided to the Gravatar service to check if you are using it
(Gravatar Privacy Policy: [here](https://automattic.com/privacy/)).

Who We Share Your Data With** Your IP address is included in the
password reset email if you request a password reset.

Where Your Data Is Sent** Visitor comments may be checked through an
automated spam detection service.

Data Protection and Privacy** In compliance with Swiss law, we ensure
the security and confidentiality of your data, provide rights to access,
rectify, and erase data, and do not share data without consent.
